portfolio.about: I am a junior at Visvesvaraya National Institute of Technology, pursuing Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering. As an engineer at heart I like to build things, such as this website and the projects in my projects section. As a member of IvLabs, a  student-run research community, I also discovered an interest in machine learning. I have further refined my skills and deepened my understanding of a few domains. I am eager to continue pushing the boundaries of technology and humbly contribute my expertise to impactful projects.

projects.description: Implemented Variational Autoencoder(VAE), Sigma-VAE and Generative Adversarial Network (GAN). Generated images from gaussian estimating real data distribution of CIFAR-10 dataset and achieved a FID score of 169.29.
Implemented various autoencoder networks, starting with vanilla model moving on to denoising autoencoder, then sparse and contractive autoencoder.
Created a snake game using OpenCV and Python. The game was controlled by a stylus which was tracked using OpenCV.
